events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage your application for the Software Engineer position.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully; the hiring team is impressed with your background.
Thank you for your prompt response to our scheduling request; we look forward to moving ahead.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 8th at 10 AM UTC with the senior engineering team.
You completed the technical interview with excellent results; the panel members expressed enthusiasm.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 12th at 2 PM UTC to discuss benefits and company culture.
